name: @habityzer/nuxt-symfony-kinde-layer
description: Shared Nuxt layer for Symfony + Kinde authentication integration

scripts.prepare:ci: pnpm install && KINDE_AUTH_DOMAIN=https://placeholder.kinde.com KINDE_CLIENT_ID=placeholder KINDE_CLIENT_SECRET=placeholder KINDE_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:3000/api/auth/callback KINDE_LOGOUT_REDIRECT_URL=http://localhost:3000 NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_COOKIE_PREFIX=auth_ NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_LOGIN_PATH=/login NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_CLOCK_SKEW_SECONDS=300 NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_APP_TOKEN_PREFIX=Bearer NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_E2E_TOKEN_COOKIE_NAME=e2e_token NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_ID_TOKEN_NAME=id_token NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_NAME=access_token NUXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_NAME=refresh_token pnpm nuxt prepare
